Hero.description: A central hub for Eastern European students. Where Western European funding meets Eastern European minds

Divisions.title: Our Divisions
Divisions.subtitle: Each division owns its programming, calendar, and partnerships â€” united by CEEA's identity and standards.
Divisions.cultureDesc: Promotes the diverse cultural palette of the region through themed events, traditions, food, music, and collaborations, celebrating diversity and creating cultural osmosis on campus.
Divisions.diplomacyDesc: Organizes debates, discussions, panels, and speaker events on international relations, policy, and regional affairs, encouraging informed debate and engagement with current issues.
Divisions.fintechDesc: Curates events and learning opportunities focused on fintech and innovation in the region, connecting students with industry trends, professionals, and practical insights in finance and tech.
Divisions.socialDesc: Plans and delivers social events that bring people together, both members and guests, strengthen the community, and create a welcoming space for networking and friendships.

EventsList.noEvents: No events in this category yet.

EventsPage.title: Events
EventsPage.description: From flagship speaker nights to small, high-trust formats. If it feels like something you would tell a friend about the next day, we do it.

NewsletterPage.title: Newsletter
NewsletterPage.description: Short, high-signal updates: what we hosted, what's next, and the people and ideas we're bringing to campus.

JoinUsPage.title: Join Us
JoinUsPage.content: We are always looking for new members to join our team. Connect with us to learn more about recruitment.

AboutPage.title: What CEEA is.
AboutPage.mission: A student association at Bocconi is a structured, student-run organization that builds community and creates programming on campus: events, partnerships, and a visible presence in the student ecosystem. CEEA focuses that energy around Central & Eastern Europe.
AboutPage.divisionsSubtitle: Four verticals, one mission. Each owns its programming, calendar, and partnerships.
AboutPage.reality1Body: Associations typically recruit at the start of semesters and during on-campus association fairs. Consistency and clear roles matter more than huge headcount.
AboutPage.reality2Body: The strongest associations operate like a small studio: defined owners, repeatable formats, and a high bar for comms, logistics, and partner experience.
AboutPage.reality3Body: Joint events with other associations are common and high-leverage: they extend reach, share best practices, and create more interesting formats.
AboutPage.reality4Body: In a campus full of posters, your visual system is part of your credibility. A consistent aesthetic signals seriousness, even for events.
AboutPage.partnersBody: We collaborate with companies, alumni, and other Bocconi associations. If you want a curated audience and a clean execution, we should talk.
AboutPage.partner1Body: A focused session (60-90 min) with real value: case, hiring, or region-specific insights.
AboutPage.partner2Body: Brand placement + speaking moment + recruiting angle, aligned with a signature event.
AboutPage.partner3Body: Enable small formats: dinners, cultural calendar moments, and student travel experiences.
